document_data.name: Thepurl's Diamond
document_data.mainbody: '''''Thepurl's Diamond''''' was a sailing ship on the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]] owned by the [[lich]] [[Ebonsoul]].
document_data.History: The ship was attacked and sunk by pirates around the time of the [[Spellplague]].{{Cite digital book/The Companions/Kindle|3674}} It came to rest in around 200 feet (61 m) of water. In [[1481 DR]], the wreck was discovered off the coast of [[Aglarond]] by [[Pericolo Topolino]], the [[halfling]] [[guild]]master of a powerful [[Delthuntle]] criminal guild. The choicest treasures were plundered by Pericolo's expedition but they unwittingly released Ebonsoul from his imprisonment.{{Cite digital book/The Companions/Kindle|4490}}
